translations.GAME_ADJUSTMENTS_KNOWING_YOUR_LIMITS: Knowing your limit is always the best bet. Call 1-800-270-7117 for help.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY2: To purchase the game, click PLAY or press the spacebar.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY3: To Play the game press REVEAL ALL or press each number manually.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY4: Match any of Your Numbers to any of the Winning Numbers, win the prize shown below that number.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY5: Match one or more Winning Numbers to unlock 1 additional Winning Number; if the unlocked Winning Number forms a match, unlock an additional Winning Number.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY6: Reveal a 2X symbol to win double the prize shown.
translations.GAME_RULES_TEXT: For more details about the game, refer to the [Game Rules]
